context_bundle.summary: Kubernetes container orchestration: define resources in YAML manifests (Deployment, Service, ConfigMap, Secret, Ingress). Deployments manage ReplicaSets/Pods with replicas, containers, resources, probes. Services expose Pods (ClusterIP, NodePort, LoadBalancer). kubectl apply -f manifest.yml (create/update), kubectl get/describe/logs/exec. Namespaces isolate resources. Labels/selectors link resources. Rolling updates, autoscaling.

onboarding.quick_start: Kubernetes deployment: Deployment manifest with apiVersion: apps/v1, kind: Deployment, metadata: {name: myapp}, spec: {replicas: 3, selector: {matchLabels: {app: myapp}}, template: {metadata: {labels: {app: myapp}}, spec: {containers: [{name: myapp, image: myapp:1.0, ports: [{containerPort: 8080}]}]}}}. Service: kind: Service, spec: {type: LoadBalancer, selector: {app: myapp}, ports: [{port: 80, targetPort: 8080}]}. Apply: kubectl apply -f deployment.yml, kubectl get pods, kubectl logs pod-name, kubectl describe deployment myapp.
common_patterns: Deployment: apiVersion: apps/v1, kind: Deployment, spec: {replicas: 3, selector: {matchLabels: {app: myapp}}}
Container: containers: [{name: web, image: nginx:1.21, ports: [{containerPort: 80}], resources: {limits: {cpu: '500m', memory: '512Mi'}}}]
Service ClusterIP: kind: Service, spec: {type: ClusterIP, selector: {app: myapp}, ports: [{port: 80}]}
Service LoadBalancer: spec: {type: LoadBalancer, ports: [{port: 80, targetPort: 8080}]}
Secret: kind: Secret, type: Opaque, data: {password: base64encoded}
Get: kubectl get pods -n namespace -l app=myapp
